about_the_game:
RogueLite/Soulslike Designed to be enjoyed by both children and adults with an easy to understand combat system that can prepare a beginner for a big title souls like Or give a veteran Some goodtimes and laughs. with enough variety in character leveling to make replayablity enjoyable. Search for your sister as you Destroy monsters and grow stronger with stat upgrades giving you different classes based on your choice of upgrade. Choose To upgrade defense and become a tank! Or Go for crit and make yourself a rogue. Each upgrade will change the combat experience not only changing your attack patterns but also modifying your character look and feel while unlocking new abilites. Complete Puzzles to gain permanent upgrades that persist through your next run. beat all the bosses. Save your sister. And the dungeons you fight in will become your playground!
- Random Dungeons give endless replayability
- Intense boss fights create action packed moments for you to enjoy
- Puzzles that force you to outsmart the game dev!
- all held together with wonderful AI intent on making you feel a little bit dumb
Take head adventurer.. Your time to search and slay endlessly has come.
